official_title: To exclude from income amounts received under part E of title IV of the Social Security Act for the purposes of determining the amount of benefits to be provided under the Food Stamp Act of 1977 and the United States Housing Act of 1937.

summary.text: Excludes from income under the Food Stamp Act of 1977 (food stamp assistance) and the United States Housing Act of 1937 (rental assistance) payments received under part E (Foster Care and Adoption Assistance) of title IV of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: To exclude from income amounts received under part E of title IV of the Social Security Act for the purposes of determining the amount of benefits to be provided under the Food Stamp Act of 1977 and the United States Housing Act of 1937.
